meanings.definition: The position or role of a consultant.
meanings.sent1: Her consultantship at the firm allowed her to assist clients with their business strategies.
meanings.sent2: In her consultantship, she advised companies on marketing tactics.
meanings.sent3: His consultantship was so valued that he was nicknamed 'The Strategy Guru'.
meanings.sent4: The consultantship of the team leader guided the project to success.
meanings.sent5: The consultantship of the experienced advisor was sought after by many businesses.

meanings.definition: The act of providing expert advice or guidance as a consultant.
meanings.sent1: During her consultantship, she helped businesses improve their operations.
meanings.sent2: His consultantship involved analyzing data to offer solutions to clients.
meanings.sent3: The consultantship of the tech expert saved the company from a major crisis.
meanings.sent4: Her consultantship was like a beacon of light in the sea of confusion for the clients.
meanings.sent5: The consultantship of the financial advisor was instrumental in increasing profits for the company.
